name: Second Sight (itch)
description:
small  experimental endless survival arcade game made for the geoJam in 2 days ,   all assets created by me 

side notes - with the theme : pick a side  i implemented if you are on left or right side of battlefield you have a different secondary attack with the right mouse button  / each zone lights up based on where you are standing -

- after 100 seconds a second companion is unlocked and a second wave of enemies spawn

- every playthrough has random enemy generation
